snippet.title: Portal Stories: VR Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
See here the first glimpses of Portal Stories: VR.
Coming to Steam for free early April 2016.
Portal Stories: VR is a 10-puzzle mini-campaign designed for the 360 degrees Roomscale that the HTC Vive offers.

Check out Portal Stories: VR on Steam here:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/446750
